Title: Securing a WCF service in Silverlight 3.0
Description: This project demonstrates how to securing your WCF service with a custom username & password using ClientCredentials property.

Project Summary

One of the little known features when using WCF with Silverlight 3, is that it now supports securing your WCF service with a custom username & password.
